Summary

Infrastructure engineer with a passion for automation, continuous everything, and the democratization of the ability to run bigger apps more reliably at greater scale. Enjoyer of troubleshooting complex problems and experienced carrier of the pager. Practitioner of HugOps. Not a web designer (obviously).
